Meeting Description: Your counselor and one of our testing experts will work with you to fine-tune your standardized testing plan and make sure you’re well prepared for tests like the SAT, ACT, and AP exams.

Discuss AP exams - determine AP exam preparation plan                                               3. Share any of these guides as needed: Guide to ACT, Guide to the PSAT, Guide to SAT as needed
